messages.title: Fighting for a better not bigger Heathrow and reducing night flights
messages.content: Mary is leading the local fight to stop Heathrow expansion and for a better not bigger Heathrow. She has also been campaigning for a reduction in night flights and for the implementation of a night noise quota to protect local residents.

messages.title: Your vote could be the difference - don't risk it
Let’s stay on the road to a stronger economy
messages.content: Britain has started growing again. But there's more to do:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eliminate the deficit, keep taxes down, and help businesses create more jobs.
Keep jobless down, help young people working or in training and create two million new jobs.
Cap welfare to £23,000 a year and freeze benefits for two years.
Pass on your pensions to loved ones tax-free and increase the basic state pension by protecting triple lock.
Raise personal allowance to £12,500 and cut the 40p tax rate when you earn over £50,000.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Brentford and Isleworth is one of the handful out of 650 constituencies that could determine the nation's future and who will be Britain's Prime Minister.

issues.economy: Britain has started growing again. But there's more to do.
issues.education: Two new schools locally have been approved under this Government.
issues.environment: Mary is leading the local fight to stop Heathrow expansion and for a better not bigger Heathrow.
issues.socialWelfare: Cap welfare to £23,000 a year and freeze benefits for two years.

housing.content: Mary wants residents to be heard on Town Centre regeneration.

endorsements.endorsement: This year's General Election you won't just be deciding who will represent you at your local area, because Brentford and Isleworth is one of the handful out of 650 constituencies that could determine the nation's future and who will be Britain's Prime Minister.

quotes.text: Mary is a really strong voice for local residents. She has worked tirelessly for everyone in Brentford and Isleworth. She is passionate about improving our area for everyone and has achieved so much in just four years.

images.caption: Mary with Prime Minister David Cameron
Mary celebrating more than 2,400 apprenticeships locally
